mapper.select: select distinct cinemaNum, cinemaRegion, movieNum from cinema c natural join cinema_info ci where movieNum = ${movieNum};

select ctno, theaterno, movieNum, cinemaNum, cinemaRegion, name theaterName, movieName, screenTimeNum, screenTimeTime , 184 - (select count(*) from ticket t where t.ctno = ct.ctno and screendate = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y%m%d')) remain from cinema ct natural join cinema_info c natural join theater_info natural join screentime s natural join movie m where movieNum = #{movieNum} and cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} order by cinemaNum, theaterno

select ctno, theaterno, movieNum, cinemaNum, cinemaRegion, name theaterName, movieName, screenTimeNum, screenTimeTime , 184 - (select count(*) from ticket t where t.ctno = ct.ctno and screendate = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y%m%d')) remain from cinema ct natural join cinema_info c natural join theater_info natural join screentime s natural join movie m where movieNum = #{movieNum} and cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} and screenTimeNum = #{screenTimeNum} and theaterno = #{theaterno} order by cinemaNum, theaterno
mapper.insert: insert into cinema (theaterno, cinemaNum, movieNum, screenTimeNum) values (#{theaterno}, #{cinemaNum}, #{movieNum}, #{screenTimeNum})
